name: Paul Johnston - trying to be civil (as a service)

content.html: I really am beginning to hate the phrase "thoughts and prayers". We need to replace it with "activism, tears and anger at the injustice". I am "thinking" about it and I am "praying" but good grief it's an exceptionally passive way to say you sound holy while doing nothing.
content.value:
I really am beginning to hate the phrase "thoughts and prayers".

We need to replace it with "activism, tears and anger at the injustice".

I am "thinking" about it and I am "praying" but good grief it's an exceptionally passive way to say you sound holy while doing nothing.
